page.title: 16EVENTS CALENDAR
page.content:
The following events were held in the East Wellow area during the autumn and winter. The barn dance was held on September 26th and the autumn fayre was held by the Newtown Methodist Church on October 8th. This was followed by the harvest supper on October 15th and the cheese and wine party on October 23rd and 26th.The village coffee evening was held on November 7th. The spectacular bonfire and fireworks night took place at Dr Hill's farm in Branches Lane and this was followed on November 21st by the church bonanza.The childrens Christmas party was held on December 21st with the S.E.D.C.A.party on the same date.
All this demonstrates the extent of community involvement in this area at present.
